title: League of Nations vs UN assessments 9_8 MCQ 2

content.question: Based on the two passages, the authors would most likely have agreed that

choices.label: international organizations dedicated to maintaining world peace need to have effective enforcement mechanisms
both the League of Nations and the United Nations were completely ineffective
giving UN Security Council veto power to communist countries such as the Soviet Union and China was a mistake
the shortage of funding from member states was the main reason for the organizational challenges experienced by both the League and the UN

content.answer: international organizations dedicated to maintaining world peace need to have effective enforcement mechanisms

topic.text: 9.8: Institutions Developing in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
